game.description: In the far-off land of Zeebies, a terrible plague has stricken the town's only unicorn, Seraphina. Your objective is to find the antidote and save Seraphina.
game.objective: Find the antidote and cure the unicorn.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and the Amulet of Zeebo

tasks.description: Find the ancient manuscript in the Old Library which contains the recipe for the antidote.
Gather all the ingredients mentioned in the manuscript.
Brew the antidote in the Wizened Hermit's cauldron.

game.title: The Unicorn's Plight
